column2: "Can I get your advice on something? I want to go all-out on our New Year celebration and make it as flashy as possible."
"I've been thinking and thinking... But I just can't come up with anything! So, I thought I'd expand my horizons a bit."
"You've been all over and seen all kinds of other planets' cultures! Can you help me think of something fresh and exciting for the New Year's event?"

"せっかくのハロウィンだし
みんなが楽しんでくれるようなことを
考えてはいるんだけど……"

"気軽にできて、みんなが笑顔になる……
そんなアイデアって、何かないかな？"
